data.text:
Hiding out in one appendix is the clinical data for Pfizer’s vaccine — which lists 1,291 adverse side effects in alphabetical order. 

https://t.co/s5noLuBZLu
@dawnbrooks70 A much bigger risk for myocarditis is covid infection.

Call your elected representatives, call your senators, call everyone you know to put a stop to this today.

Do not allow anyone to jab a child with this stuff.

There’s simply no good reason.

Tell your friends and tell your family: the vaccination of children must stop immediately. The U.S. government has bought 50 million doses of this poison for children under the age of 5 pedning FDa approval and it must never be allowed to use them.
Why would the FDA approve a new vaccine when 15,000 people had serious disorders of the nervous system after taking it?

Pfizer was aware of more than 158,000 “adverse events” when they asked for approval from the FDA. People had serious issues after taking the Pfizer vaccine and Pfizer knew it before it sought approval for its vaccine. Look at this chart compiled by Pfizer itself. https://t.co/7C486V8L4y
@dawnbrooks70 As a viral disease, how can "herpes" be a side effect?

And don’t tell me that your chances are slim of getting injured. The U.S. government’s own database, the Vaccine Adverse Events Reporting System (VAERS), has over 1 million reports of “adverse events” to the new vaccines — with 24,000 events listed as “death.”

a brain stem embolism, acute kidney injury, cardiac failure, frontal lobe epilepsy, Hashimoto’s encephalopathy, herpes, interstitial lung disease, or Type 1 diabetes mellitus — just to pick a few very serious side effects from a very sobering list.
You already know that children, especially young boys, can get myocarditis from the vaccines but you should add to that list the serious possibility of them getting:
